title: Disney+ wonâ€™t show ads or collect data from children on ad-supported tier
content:
It’s only been a few years since the launch of Disney+, yet the service has amassed a whopping 137 million subscribers in that short amount of time. As Disney looks towards the future, it will look to add more subscribers, through a more affordable option. While it is uncertain as to when it will arrive,

The post Disney+ won’t show ads or collect data from children on ad-supported tier appeared first on XDA.
description: Disney is inching closer to offering an ad-supported version of Disney+. Prior to its launch, it has made it clear on how its ads will work.
